EmailTemplate.description: IN USE This email is sent when an external reviewer is deactivated
EmailTemplate.name: ExternalReviewerDeactivationEmail
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: External Reviewer has been Deactivated
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Subject: Notification of external reviewer deactivated.
Hello {!Target_User.FirstName},
This email is to notify you that your account have been deactivated.
Sincerely, EGMS Team
